mapper.select: SELECT f.* FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `user_favorite` uf ON u.id = uf.user_id LEFT JOIN `favorite` f ON f.id = uf.favorite_id WHERE u.username = #{username}

SELECT f.id, f.title, f.is_private, ifnull(fp.problem_id, -1) as problem_id FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `user_favorite` uf ON u.id = uf.user_id LEFT JOIN `favorite` f ON f.id = uf.favorite_id LEFT JOIN `favorite_problem` fp ON uf.favorite_id = fp.favorite_id WHERE u.username = #{username}
